title: Creating Text and Mathtext Using Pyplot
description: Matplotlib is a powerful data visualization library in Python. It provides a wide range of tools to create graphs and plots in Python. In this tutorial, we will learn how to create text and mathtext using pyplot.

meta.title: Python Data Visualization | Matplotlib Tutorial | Lab
meta.description: Learn how to create text and mathtext using Matplotlib, a powerful data visualization library in Python.
meta.keywords: Python, Data Visualization, Matplotlib, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy
